--- value_subquery_select_as_struct.sql
(SELECT AS STRUCT 1 AS i)

--- AST
&ast.ScalarSubQuery{
  Rparen: 24,
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select: 1,
    As: &ast.AsStruct{
      As: 8,
      Struct: 11,
    },
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 18,
          ValueEnd: 19,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "1",
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As: 20,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 23,
            NameEnd: 24,
            Name: "i",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT AS STRUCT 1 AS i)
